description: A customizable divider component used to separate content horizontally or vertically

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the divider line.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content to display in the divider.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the divider element.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The orientation of the divider. This is in reference to how content will be rendered around the divider.

properties.name: responsive
properties.description: Whether the divider is responsive or not.
